name: Canopy (lemon juice, Idyia_x, riicoo)
description:
CONTROLS

AD Movement | W Jump | R Restart

You are the Avian God of Death and everything you touch withers away. Tired of this constant destruction of life, you wish to be relieved of your duty.

Birds around the forest have been stealing life totems from local shamans. They are the key to your freedom.

Steal these totems and bring them back to your nest
